sense.def:
Shackles
sta kovinska obroča na verigi; nekomu jo pritrdijo okoli zapestij ali gležnjev, da se ne more gibati ali pobegniti.

To shackle someone
pomeni nekomu pritrditi okove.

seg.quote: The guards shackled his wrists and ankles.

sense.def:
Shackles
so tudi okoliščine, ki nam preprečujejo, da bi naredili tisto, kar si želimo;

seg.quote: There are a few who have managed to throw off the shackles of the past.

sense.def:
To be shackled by something
pomeni, da nam nekaj preprečuje, da bi naredili tisto, kar bi želeli;

seg.quote: He is shackled by domestic responsibilities.
